issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
1. Titanium Studio installed
2. Run Studio, with entering Titanium login and proxy setup
3. Update Titanium


h3. Actual Result
 It is showing error in Proxy authentication

h3. Expected Result
It should update the titanium properly
fields.summary: Titanium Studio Update fails for Proxy authentication

comments.body: We need your Operating System information and Studio diagnostic log file (Help => Studio => Run Diagnostic Test) to diagnose this issue further. It would be good to get a screenshot of the dialog box (with details) that describes that the update failed.
Resolving this ticket as we cannot reproduce this issue and reporter has not followed up on the requested information.
